participant_1.background:
I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house.
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
i like the movie godfather.
my favorite band is vv nation.
i always wear something purple.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a quiet home with a view of the woods so that I can be close to nature and focus on my writing.
I'd rather avoid conflict, but I'm ready to defend myself if I need to.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
My most prized possession is the journal I keep of my travels, which I have filled with sketches and notes from my adventures.
i own a chevy tahoe.

content.text: Hello, what are you doing for fun today?
Hi! I'm writing in my journal. What are you up to?
I'm working on a deck for my house. What do you write in your journal?
I write about my travels, sketches, and thoughts. I love getting away from the hustle and bustle and spending time in nature. Do you like to travel?

I love to travel! I've been to a lot of places, but I'm always looking for new places to explore. I'm more of an adventure traveler, I like to go places where there are no crowds and I can experience the local culture.
That sounds amazing! I'm not quite as adventurous as you are, but I do love to explore new places. I'm a big fan of historical travel, so I like to visit places with a lot of history and culture.

That's cool! I love learning about history, so I'm sure you'd find some interesting things to see at my house. I live in a historic neighborhood, and there are a lot of old buildings and houses around.
That sounds like a great place to live! I'd love to come visit sometime.
You're welcome to! I'd be happy to show you around.
